title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
writers:
Leigh Brackett, 
Lawrence Kasdan,
George Lucas
actors:
Mark Hamill,
Harrison Ford,
Carrie Fisher
shortDescription: After the Rebels are overpowered by the Empire, Luke Skywalker begins his Jedi training with Yoda, while his friends are pursued across the galaxy by Darth Vader and bounty hunter Boba Fett.

title: The Matrix
actors:
Keanu Reaves,
Laurence Fishburne,
Carrie-Anne Moss
shortDescription: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.

title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
actors:
Mark Hamill,
Harrison Ford,
Carrie Fisher
shortDescription: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth Vader.

title: Back to the Future
actors:
Michael J. Fox,
Christopher Lloyd,
Lea Thompson
shortDescription: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.

title: Alien
actors:
Sigourney Weaver,
Tom Skerritt,
John Hurt
shortDescription: The crew of a commercial spacecraft encounter a deadly lifeform after investigating an unknown transmission.

title: Raiders of th Lost Ark
writers:
Lawrence Kasdan, 
George Lucas, 
Philip Kaufman
actors:
Harrison Ford, 
Karen Allen,
Paul Freeman
shortDescription: In 1936, archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the U.S. government to find the Ark of the Covenant before the Nazis can obtain its awesome powers.

title: Blade Runner
writers:
Hampton Fancher, 
David Webb Peoples, 
Philip K. Dick
actors:
Harrison Ford, 
Rutger Hauer, 
Sean Young
shortDescription: A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

title: The Terminator
writers:
James Cameron,
Gale Anne Hurd,
William Wisher
actors:
Arnold Schwarzenegger, 
Linda Hamilton, 
Michael Biegn
shortDescription: A human soldier is sent from 2029 to 1984 to stop an almost indestructible cyborg killing machine, sent from the same year, which has been programmed to execute a young woman whose unborn son is the key to humanity's future salvation.

title: The Princess Bride
actors:
Cary Elwes,
Mandy Patinkin,
Robin Wright
shortDescription: A bedridden boy's grandfather reads him the story of a farmboy-turned-pirate who encounters numerous obstacles, enemies and allies in his quest to be reunited with his true love.

title: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
writers:
Gene Roddenberry,
Jack B. Sowards,
Harve Bennett
actors:
William Shatner,
Leonard Nimoy,
DeForest Kelley
shortDescription: With the assistance of the Enterprise crew, Admiral Kirk must stop an old nemesis, Khan Noonien Singh, from using the life-generating Genesis Device as the ultimate weapon.

title: Sholay
actors:
Sanjeev Kumar,
Dharmendra,
Amitabh Bachchan
shortDescription: After his family is murdered by a notorious and ruthless bandit, a former police officer enlists the services of two outlaws to capture the bandit.

title: The Lords of the Rings: The Return of the King
actors:
Elijah Wood,  
 Ian McKellen, 
Liv Mckellen
shortDescription: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the world of men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

title: The Lords of the Rings: The Two Tower
actors:
Elijah Wood, 
 Ian McKellen,  
 Liv Mckellen
shortDescription: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

title: Pirates of the Caribbean:Dead men tell no tales
writers:
Jeff Nathanson,
Terry Rossio,
 Ted Elliot
actors:
Johnny Depp,
 Geoffrey Rush, 
 Javier Bardem
shortDescription: Captain Jack Sparrow is pursued by old rival Captain Salazar and a crew of deadly ghosts who have escaped from the Devil's Triangle. They're determined to kill every pirate at sea...notably Jack.

title: Pirates of the Caribbean:The Curse of the Black Pearl
writers:
Ted Elliot,  
Terry Rossio, 
Stuart Beattie
actors:
Johnny Depp, 
 Geoffrey Rush,
 Orland Bloom
shortDescription: Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate "Captain" Jack Sparrow to save his love, the governor's daughter, from Jack's former pirate allies, who are now undead.

title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
actors:
Daniel Radcliffe, 
Emma Watson,
 Rupert Grint
shortDescription: With their warning about Lord Voldemort's return scoffed at, Harry and Dumbledore are targeted by the Wizard authorities as an authoritarian bureaucrat slowly seizes power at Hogwarts.

title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
actors:
Daniel Radcliffe,
Emma Watson,
 Rupert Grint
shortDescription: Harry, Ron, and Hermione search for Voldemort's remaining Horcruxes in their effort to destroy the Dark Lord as the final battle rages on at Hogwarts.

title: San Andreas
writers:
Carlton Cuse, 
Andre Fabrizio, 
Jeremy Passmore
actors:
Dwayne Johnson,
Carla Gugino,
 Alexandra Daddario
shortDescription: In the aftermath of a massive earthquake in California, a rescue-chopper pilot makes a dangerous journey with his ex-wife across the state in order to rescue his daughter.

title: Love and Monsters
actors:
Dylan O'Brien, 
 Jessica Henwick,
Michael Rooker
shortDescription: Seven years after he survived the monster apocalypse, lovably hapless Joel leaves his cozy underground bunker behind on a quest to reunite with his ex.

title: World Wr Z
writers:
Matthew Michael Carnahan, 
 Drew Goddard, 
Damon Lindelof
actors:
Brat Pitt,
 Mirelle Enos,
 Daniella Kretesz
shortDescription: Former United Nations employee Gerry Lane traverses the world in a race against time to stop a zombie pandemic that is toppling armies and governments and threatens to destroy humanity itself.

title: Godzilla: The King of the Monsters
writers:
Michael Dougherty,
 Zach Sheilds,

actors:
Kyle Chandler,

 Mille Bobby Brown
shortDescription: The crypto-zoological agency Monarch faces off against a battery of god-sized monsters, including the mighty Godzilla, who collides with Mothra, Rodan, and his ultimate nemesis, the three-headed King Ghidorah

actors:
Emily Watson , 
Liam Johnson,

shortDescription: A young girl embarks on a magical journey to save her village from an ancient curse.

title: Midnight Echoes
actors:
Rachel Adams, 
Mark Harrison ,

shortDescription: A woman becomes entangled in a web of secrets and deception when she receives mysterious midnight phone calls.

title: Chasing Dreams
actors:
Jennifer Roberts,
Ryan Parker, 
 Emma Thompson
shortDescription: Two strangers from different backgrounds cross paths and find love while pursuing their dreams in the city.

title: Iron Man
actors:
Robert Downey Jr., 
 Gwyneth Paltrow, 
 Jeff Bridges
shortDescription: After being held captive in an Afghan cave, billionaire engineer Tony Stark creates a unique weaponized suit of armor to fight evil. After being kidnapped by a powerful terrorist organization, brilliant industrialist Tony Stark narrowly escapes using an iron suit he crafted from scrap metal and spare parts.

title: The Imitation Game
actors:
Benedict Cumberbatch,  
Keira Knightley,                                 Matthew Goode
shortDescription: THE IMITATION GAME portrays the nail-biting race against time by Turing and his brilliant team of code-breakers at Britain's top-secret Government Code and Cypher School at Bletchley Park, during the darkest days of World War II.

title: Fast & Furious Presents: Hobbs & Shaw
actors:
Dwayne Johnson,

shortDescription: Lawman Luke Hobbs and outcast Deckard Shaw form an unlikely alliance when a cyber-genetically enhanced villain threatens the future of humanity.

title: Legends of Avalon
actors:
Tom Richards, 
Emma Watson, 
Liam Johnson
shortDescription: A young hero sets out on a perilous journey to save the mystical land of Avalon from an evil sorcerer.

actors:
Emily Adams,

shortDescription: A woman's life unravels when she discovers a shocking secret that shatters her trust in those closest to her.

title: Timeless Love
actors:

shortDescription: A couple's love transcends time and space as they navigate the challenges of fate and destiny.
